product_name: Outside Inside Fireplace Canoe Santa Ornament - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Pay homage to your outdoor adventures and add a dose of charm to your holiday decorations with this whimsical Fireplace Canoe Santa ornament from Outside Inside. Ornament is made of hand-painted resin; includes braided cord to hang from the tree. Intricate details give this outdoor-themed ornament a realistic appearance that will look great on the tree. Closeout.
short_description: Pay homage to your outdoor adventures and add a dose of charm to your holiday decorations with this whimsical Fireplace Canoe Santa ornament from Outside Inside.
